name: Create with Garfield! Deluxe Edition
overview: Create With Garfield is a 1986 educational video game developed and published by Ahead Designs. This deluxe edition was released in 1987. In it, you can create With Garfield is an educational simulation game. The player can choose a character or prop to display on the screen. They can also choose certain dialogue or even write their own, provided with either a thought bubble or a speech bubble. After the copyright screen, the player with encounter a "How to make a Cartoon" screen. It explains that the player must select a background, select a stick on, then save. The Player can save their comic onto a data disk for later review.
